Summary: ORANGE GLOWING SAUCER ON VIDEOTAPE OVER Austin Tx
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around October 19th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsObject first observed in Easetern sky. Circled clowly in a NorthEasternlydirection while stopping and on occasion jumping. At one point a second objectstreaked across the sky passed the first but dissapearing immediatleythereafter. we had two video cameras trained on the object for twnety minutes orso and have observed the footage. the streaking object was captured on tape aswell. the sky was clear blue. there are several good zooms on the object wherean obvious shape is apparent. there are both tripod and handheld shots of theobject as we had time to fish the tripod out before the object disappeared.frame-by-frame reveals several interesting shots of what appears to be a disc orelliptically-shaped object. it moved higher and farther away until we couldntsee it. these tapes are pretty good if yall want em.
